SEARCH
Package photos.controller

Class BulkController

java.lang.Object
photos.controller.BulkController
public class BulkController extends Object
Controller for the home page. Internally called BulkController because it's the entry point for the bulk of the application. It allows users to open, view, and create albums, log out, search, and quit the application.
Author:
Chloe Wolohan
